EmailTemplate.name: FVF Statement Credit Total Value
EmailTemplate.subject: Review approver for {!BCD_Statement__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The FVF StatementCredit Total Value is more than $1m. Please send for the BCD file for approval to the correct approver.
Go to BCD Statement
